topics.body:
http://www.polygon.com/2015/4/15/8417717/the-witcher-3-butts-geralt-calendar


I just found this. A female fan of the witcher was let down by the calendar of thenwitcher that showed a lot of nude ladies. Did she go to twitter and complain? Call the developers mysoginistic? Boycott the game?

Nope. Her reaction...was to ask for another calendar, but one with lots of guy butts, specifically geralt the main character.

In her own words "I feel like if you want something from someone, even if that someone is a game developer, it can't hurt to contact them and ask nicely"

I like this little movement already.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55657fae6368727b261e0a00#post_55657fae6368727b261e0a00
*Ultimate being boxing*

"Welcome to the ultimate being boxing match asstravaganza!* 

"In this corner we have the one! The only! The man of all that breaths and sweats in this universe! GOD!"

*God waves*

"and in the other corner we have, the hideous (But yet still popular) the hentai original character himself! CHTHULHU!"

Chtulhu: "Hentai orginal Monster?..."

*Hold on to your pants ladies and gentlemen because the match of a century is about to begin!* 

*Ding Ding Ding* 

"Aaaand Chuhulo"

cthulhu: "Uhhhh its pronounced Ka-Thu-Lu"

"Whatever. And Cthulhu brings out a left jab at God!"

God: "Your going to need to be better than that to beat me, I MADE you" 

"Ooooh, and Gods going in hard with not only grace but also a bad mouth! Can Cthulhu keep up with the Creator?"

cthulhu's Coach (Also his wife): "Come on you sack of dicks get your head in the game!"

cthulhu: "I am in the game! I'm playing the game!"

cthulhu's Coach: "DONT YOU BACK SASS ME YOU FUCKING PUSSY FISH! BEAT UP GOD!"

cthulhu: "BUT HE'S FUCKING GOD!"

cthulhu's Coach: "WELL I'D RATHER BE FUCKING GOD THAN YOU RIGHT NOW YOU FA***"

cthulhu: "BIT-"

God: *"FORBIDDEN FRUIT UPPER"*

cthulhu: "Forbidden wh-" *UQQQHHHHHHHH!!!!*

*Ding Ding Ding*

God: "Game and Set" 

*God waves his long beard and hair beautifully* 

"And the winner! Of tonight's tournament! Is GOD!"

*[Crickets]*

*All of a sudden someone calls out god*

???? "Long time no see, God"

"Oh my God folks!"

God: "Standing right here" 

"It's last years Champion! SATAN AND HIS COACH _*DEATH*_" 

Satan: "God... We challenge you to a Death Match"

*Crowd goes wild* 

*[to be continued]*

Yes I am tired.
